column1: nka ubehe mona tsebo beha kwana nka ntho ena
tsebo skanna hata emong hampe jwale
ke eng bo u dikhathatso ke eng wena
motlohele wena monehe ntho ena yahae ena
tsebo uabatla ka matsapa ohle hoya kantle
ke chunkama ntho ena ke eng
jwale ueetsa jwang ha untseuesuha tjee
tlisa keye hoshapa ntho yane entlhodiyang
keitse utle ho ngwana wena mona
hleso seka thibela ngwana ha atsamaya wena hei
tsebo ako ake udule fatse hle
mm hei ngwana enwa oaufahla wena
ae robala mme manyeo ha uitse uarobala sekaba rehlopha
e tsebo ake utlohele emong ha aitse oarobala
ae ae uamobitsa wale ummitsetsa kae
tsebo ore udibehe kae moo ke eng
oitse ubehe yona ntho ee moo
jwale ueisa kae haeka uneueisa kae
hela wena hleso useufihlile ka mokutu oo wahao e
hleso uatseba khale kere utswe mono
dintho tsena dintsedibakwa ke wena tsena
le wena khale kere udule fatse mona
khale kere udule fatse le wena
ae neha ngwana wena ullisa ngwana wena
utlamodiha tsebo uetsang jwale hela wena
keitse ubatle seeta sa ngwana kwana
tloha ubatla hoetsa jwang jwale moo
tsebo ake udule ke eng ha usabatle hodula fatse tjee
ke eng ha usatsebe hodula tjee wena
ae ha asabatla letho ho mang kapa mang
